attributes.description:
New Arrival @ Bidvest McCarthy Silverlakes. 

Balance of Motorplan (5years/100,000km)

Test drives at your door, depending on your location. 
All vehicles come with certificates from Dekra. 

Trade-Ins are welcome. Delivery to your door. 

Finance Requirements: 
1. Copy of ID 
2. Copy of Driver’s License 
3. Proof of Address 
4. 3 Months Bank Statements 
5. 3 Months Payslips. 

Price excluding License and Registration as well as Delivery Fee and is subject to your location. 

Contact us at Bidvest McCarthy Isuzu, we are based in Pretoria Silverlakes.

Automatic.
160 000km Full service history 
Excellent condition 
Exceptionally clean
Ideal Student vehicle
Accident free

Strictly Cash or Eft.
No finance available.
Trade Ins will be considered.
Contact Rashaad on 082 442 9952 or Nasar on 082 701 5786
